title: Essential Readings in Light Metal [4 Vol. Set]
description:
This new four-volume set contains compilations of the best papers in the 40+ year history of this definitive reference in the field of aluminum production and related light metals technologies. Each volume contains a strong mix of materials science and practical, applied technology surrounding its particular topic.

Essential Readings in Light Metals, Volume 1: Alumina and Bauxite
Don Donaldson, Benny E. Raahauge, Editors
ISBN 9 78-1-118-63664-0

Essential Readings in Light Metals, Volume 2: Aluminum Reduction Technology
Geoff Bearne, Marc Dupuis, Gary Tarcy, Editors
ISBN 9 78-1-118-63574-2

Essential Readings in Light Metals, Volume 3: Cast Shop for Aluminum Production
John F. Grandfield, Dmitry G. Eskin, Editors
ISBN 9 78-1-118-63571-1

Essential Readings in Light Metals, Volume 4: Electrode Technology for Aluminum Production
Alan Tomsett, John Johnson, Editors
ISBN 978-1-118-63663-3
